DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate the association between the use of β blockers and mortality among hospital survivors of acute myocardial infarction without heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: β Blocker Use and Mortality in Hospital Survivors of Acute Myocardial Infarction Without Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: acute myocardial infarction patients only aged 18 to 100 years other final diagnosis besides acute myocardial infarction died inhospital patients with missing mortality data aged > 100 patients with previous acute myocardial infarction or angina patients who have received coronary interventions before patients with heart failure patients with β blocker prior use patients contraindicated for β blocker use patients with use of a loop diuretic
